text.div:
FindCandidatesByExample

QUERY: FindCandidatesByExample

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/ca-bc/client/OperationDefinition/bc-patient-find-candidates

URL: [base]/Patient/$FindCandidates

Input parameters Profile: FindCandidatesRequestBundle

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INmessageId1..1string
(string)

Unique message ID in Parameters entry of the Bundle.

INmessageDateTime1..1dateTime

Message date and time in Parameters entry of the Bundle.

INsender1..1Identifier

Message sender in Parameters entry of the Bundle.

INenterer0..1Identifier

UserId of enterer in Parameters entry of the Bundle.

INidentifiersOnly0..1boolean

Instruct the Client Registry to return Patient Identifiers only when true. If not present, defaults to false. This is located in the Parameters entry of the Bundle.

INpatient0..1Patient

Patient resource as Bundle entry.

INmothersPHN0..1RelatedPerson

Patient mother's PHN as RelatedPerson.Identifier in Bundle.

parameter.name: messageId
parameter.documentation: Unique message ID in Parameters entry of the Bundle.

parameter.name: messageDateTime
parameter.documentation: Message date and time in Parameters entry of the Bundle.

parameter.name: sender
parameter.documentation: Message sender in Parameters entry of the Bundle.

parameter.name: enterer
parameter.documentation: UserId of enterer in Parameters entry of the Bundle.

parameter.name: identifiersOnly
parameter.documentation: Instruct the Client Registry to return Patient Identifiers only when true.  If not present, defaults to false.  This is located in the Parameters entry of the Bundle.

parameter.name: mothersPHN
parameter.documentation: Patient mother's PHN as RelatedPerson.Identifier in Bundle.
